publication_name.en: JOURNAL OF THE AMERICAN CHEMICAL SOCIETY

paper_title.ja: Stereoselective Synthesis of Anti b-Hydroxy-a-amino Acids through Dynamic Kinetic Resolution

paper_title.en: Efficient construction of 1,2-dihydroquinoline and 1,2,3,4-tetrahydroquinoline rings using tandem Michael-aldol reaction

description.en: 1,2-Dihydroquinolines and a 1,2,3,4-tetrahydroquinoline were efficiently constructed using tandem Michael-aldol reaction starting from N-protected o-aminobenzaldehydes and alpha,beta-unsaturated carbonyl compounds in good yield. (C) 2003 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.

paper_title.ja: Synthesis of the acyl side chain segment of polyoxypeptins using regioselective ring-opening of chiral 2, 3-epoxy alcohol.
Asymmetric Allylic Substitution Reactions of 2-Substituted 2-Cycloalkenyl Carbonates using 9-PBN Coordinated Palladium.
Efficiently Enantioselective Synthesis of (2R, 3R)- and (2S, 3S)-3-Hydroxyleucines and Their Diastereomers through Dynamic Kinetic Resolution.

paper_title.en: Synthesis of new chiral amines, 2,6-dimethyl-9-azabicyclo[3.3.1]nonane and its derivatives

description.en: New chiral amines, 2,6-dimethyl-9-azabicyclo[3.3.1]nonane and its derivatives, were prepared starting from commercially available 1,5-dimethyl-1,5-cyclooctadiene followed by substitution reaction of the intermediate ditosylate with p-toluenesulfonamide under phase transfer conditions in 4 steps.

paper_title.en: Asymmetric allylic substitution reaction with nitrogen and oxygen nucleophiles using monodentate chiral phosphine, 9-PBN

description.en: Asymmetric allylic substitution reactions between 1,3-diphenyl-2-propenyl acetate and various hetero nucleophiles were efficiently carried out using the catalysts derived from the monodentate phosphine ligands, (1R, 2S, 5R, 6S)-2,6-dimethyl-9-phenyl-9-phosphabicyc[3.3.1]nonane and its enantiomer ((-)- and (+)-9-PBNs), and palladium (0). (C) 1999 Elsevier Science Ltd. All rights reserved.

paper_title.ja: Remarkable Endo Selectivity on Hydroxylation of Bicyclic Lactam Enolates with MoOPD and MoOPH.
Asymmetric Allylic Substitution reaction with Nitrogen and Oxygen Nucleophiles using Monodentate Chiral Phosphine, 9-PBN.

paper_title.en: Remarkable Endo Selectivity or Hydroxylation of Bicyclic Lactam Enolates with MoOPD and MoOPH
Constuction of Three Building Blocks for the Total Synthesis of Microsclero dermins
A Efficient Egnthesis of Altero bettimA, a Super Sideiohpore of Mcsine Origin
Novel M→C Acyl Migration Reaction of Acyclic Imides : A Facile Method for α-Aminohetones and β-Aminoalcohols
A new efficient synthesis of nicotianamine and 2'-deoxymugineic acid

description.en: Nicotianamine and 2'-deoxymugineic acid, phytosiderophores, have been efficiently synthesized, which will be suitable for large scale production of these plant physiologically important compounds. The synthetic method for 2',3 ''-dideoxy-3 ''-oxomugineic acid was also investigated.

paper_title.en: Synthesis of Two Key Intermediates for Hennoxazole A
New monodentate chiral phosphine 2,6-dimethyl-9-phenyl-9-phosphabicyclo[3.3.1]nonane(9-PBN): Application to asymmetric allylic substitution reaction

description.en: New monodentate chiral phosphines. (+)- and (-)-2,6-dimethyl-9-phenyl-9-phosphabicyclo[3.3.1]nonanes ((+)- and (-)-9-PBNs), were prepared from 1,5-dimethyl-1,5-cyclooctadiene, and their application to the asymmetric allylic substitution reaction proved the utility of 9-PBNs as chiral phosphine ligands. Copyright (C) 1996 Elsevier Science Ltd

paper_title.en: Synthesis of Ethano-Troger's base, configurationally stable substitute of Troger's base

description.en: Optically active ethano Troger's base with configurationally stable stereogenic nitrogens and an ethylene bridge was synthesized by reaction with 1,2-dibromoethane and subsequent resolution using (-)- and (+)-di-p-toluoyl-D-tartaric acids from commercially available (+/-)-Troger's base in one step. Copyright (C) 1996 Published by Elsevier Science Ltd
